description: This file is a PHP script handling AJAX requests to configure WPS settings on wireless access points, including enabling/disabling WPS, setting methods, handling client pairing, and session cancellation.

methods.name: validChecksum
methods.description: Validates the WPS pin checksum based on a simple algorithm.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Applies SSID settings for a specific WiFi SSID.
